forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 45. Northeast wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 52. Northeast wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As the early hours unfold over Boston, the night lingers with a gentle embrace of clouds, casting shadows over the streets and buildings, hinting at the possibility of rain. A slight chance of showers casts an uncertainty over the day ahead, yet there is an inherent charm in the cool air, a briskness that brushes against the skin — a reminder of the season’s shift. The temperature rests comfortably in the mid-forties, accompanied by a northeast wind whispering through the empty streets, carrying the faint scent of damp earth. 

Tomorrow promises a similar scenario. Clouds will once again envelop the city, with a chance of rain showers greeting those who step outside. The high will linger near the low fifties, but with the wind picking up its pace, it will feel a touch cooler, especially when gusts stir the air. This weather, while not the sunniest, invites one to relish the small pleasures of life—perhaps a warm cup of coffee from a local café, where the steam rises in delicate tendrils against the chill. As you dress for the day, layers are advisable; a cozy sweater beneath a light jacket will provide warmth and flexibility for any unexpected bursts of rain. Indoor activities might beckon seductively, whether browsing through the aisles of a bookstore or enjoying the comfort of home with a good novel or movie. Embrace this day of subdued elegance, allowing the rhythm of the weather to guide you in exploring life’s quieter moments.
